alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Nassau, northern St. Johns, north central Clay and eastern Duval Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 238 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nas Jax, or near Jacksonville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Orange Park, Unf, Ponte Vedra Beach, Arlington, Neptune Beach, Baymeadows, Ortega, Craig Field and San Pablo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
